00035 namespace uvm {
00036 
00037 class uvm_component;
00038 
00039 typedef std::multimap<std::string, uvm_resource_base *> rsrc_map_type;
00040 typedef std::map<std::string, rsrc_map_type*>           rsrc_cntxt_map_type;
00041 
00042 static rsrc_cntxt_map_type m_rsrc_cntxt_map;
00043 
00044 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00046 
00048 template<typename T>
00049 class uvm_config_db :  public uvm_resource_db<T>
00050 {
00051 public:
00052 
00053     typedef uvm_resource<T> rsrc_t;
00054 
00055     uvm_config_db() : uvm_resource<T>() {}
00056     ~uvm_config_db() {}
00057 
00058     static bool get(uvm_component*    cntxt,
00059                     const std::string inst_name,
00060                     const std::string field_name,
00061                     T                 &value)
00062     {
00063         std::string cntxt_str;
00064 
00065         if (cntxt == NULL) 
00066             cntxt_str = "";
00067         else
00068             cntxt_str = uvm::uvm_get_cntxt_name(cntxt);
00069         
00070         return get(cntxt_str, inst_name, field_name, value);
00071 
00072     }
00073 
00074     static bool get(const std::string cntxt,
00075                     const std::string inst_name,
00076                     const std::string field_name,
00077                     T                 &value)
00078     {
00079         std::string         scope;
00080         uvm_resource_pool * rpool = uvm_resource_pool::get();
00081         resource_q          rsrc_q;
00082         rsrc_t            * rsrc;
00083         uvm_resource_base * rsrc_base = NULL;
00084 
00085         scope = cntxt;
00086         if (inst_name.compare("") != 0) 
00087             scope = scope + "." + inst_name;
00088 
00089         rsrc_q    = rpool->lookup_regex(scope, field_name, typeid(T));
00090         rsrc_base = rpool->get_highest_precedence(rsrc_q);
00091         rsrc = DCAST<rsrc_t*>(rsrc_base);
00092 
00093         if (rsrc == NULL)
00094         {
00095             return 0;
00096         }
00097         else
00098         {
00099             value = rsrc->read();
00100             return 1;
00101         }
00102     }
00103 
00104     static void set(uvm_component *   cntxt,
00105                     const std::string inst_name,
00106                     const std::string field_name,
00107                     const T &         value)
00108     {
00109         std::string cntxt_str;
00110 
00111         if (cntxt == NULL) 
00112             cntxt_str = "*";
00113         else
00114             cntxt_str = uvm::uvm_get_cntxt_name(cntxt);
00115 
00116         set(cntxt_str, inst_name, field_name, value);
00117     }
00118 
00119 
00120     static void set(const std::string cntxt,
00121                     const std::string inst_name,
00122                     const std::string field_name,
00123                     const T &         value)
00124     {
00125         std::string         scope;
00126         rsrc_map_type     * rsrc_map;
00127         rsrc_t            * rsrc = NULL;
00128         uvm_resource_base * rsrc_base;
00129         std::string         rsrc_key;
00130         uvm_phase         * curr_phase = uvm_common_schedule::get_uvm_common_schedule()->get_current_phase();
00131         std::pair <std::multimap<std::string, uvm_resource_base *>::iterator, std::multimap<std::string, uvm_resource_base *>::iterator> mit;
00132 
00133         if (cntxt.compare("") == 0) 
00134             scope = ".*";
00135         else 
00136             scope = cntxt;
00137 
00138         if (inst_name.compare("") != 0) 
00139             scope = cntxt +  "." + inst_name;
00140 
00141         if (m_rsrc_cntxt_map.find(cntxt) != m_rsrc_cntxt_map.end())
00142             rsrc_map = m_rsrc_cntxt_map[cntxt];
00143         else {
00144             rsrc_map = new rsrc_map_type();
00145             m_rsrc_cntxt_map[cntxt] = rsrc_map;
00146         }
00147 
00148         rsrc_key = inst_name + "." + field_name;
00149 
00150         mit = rsrc_map->equal_range(rsrc_key);
00151         std::multimap<std::string, uvm_resource_base *>::iterator it = mit.first;
00152         while ((it != mit.second) && (rsrc == NULL))
00153         {
00154             rsrc_base = it->second;
00155             rsrc = DCAST<rsrc_t*>(rsrc_base);
00156             it++;
00157         }
00158 
00159         if (rsrc == NULL)
00160         {
00161             rsrc = new rsrc_t(field_name, scope);
00162             rsrc_map->insert(std::pair<std::string, uvm_resource_base*>(rsrc_key, rsrc));
00163         }
00164 
00165         if ( (curr_phase != NULL) && (curr_phase->get_name().compare("build") == 0))
00166             rsrc->set_precedence(uvm_resource_base::m_default_precedence - get_depth(cntxt));
00167         else
00168             rsrc->set_precedence(uvm_resource_base::m_default_precedence);
00169 
00170         rsrc->write(value);
00171         rsrc->set_override();
00172 
00173         uvm_config_callback(cntxt, inst_name, field_name, rsrc);
00174     }
00175 
00176     static bool exists(uvm_component * cntxt, std::string inst_name, std::string field_name)
00177     {
00178         std::string scope;
00179 
00180         if (cntxt == NULL) 
00181             scope = "";
00182         else
00183             scope = uvm::uvm_get_cntxt_name(cntxt);
00184 
00185         if (inst_name.compare("") != 0) 
00186             scope = scope + "." + inst_name;
00187 
00188         return uvm_resource_db<T>::exists(scope, field_name);
00189     }
00190 
00191     static void wait_modified(uvm_component * cntxt, std::string inst_name, std::string field_name)
00192     {
00193         rsrc_t      * rsrc;
00194         std::string   scope;
00195         std::ostringstream outmsg;
00196 
00197         if (cntxt == NULL) 
00198             scope = "";
00199         else
00200             scope = uvm::uvm_get_cntxt_name(cntxt);
00201 
00202         if (inst_name.compare("") != 0) 
00203             scope = scope + "." + inst_name;
00204 
00205         rsrc = uvm_resource_db<T>::get_by_name_regex(scope, field_name); 
00206 
00207         if (rsrc == NULL)
00208         {
00209             outmsg << "(" << scope << "." << field_name << ")" << endl;
00210             SC_REPORT_WARNING(UVM_RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND, outmsg.str().c_str());
00211         }
00212         else
00213         {
00214             rsrc->wait_modified();
00215         }
00216 
00217     }
00218 
00219     static unsigned int get_depth(std::string cntxt)
00220     {
00221         return std::count(cntxt.begin(), cntxt.end(), '.');    
00222     }
00223 
00224 
00225 private:
00226 
00227 };
00228 
00229 template <typename T> 
00230 void uvm_set_config_int(
00231   const std::string& instname,
00232   const std::string& field,
00233   const T& val
00234 ) {
00235   sc_dt::sc_bv<4096> bv = uvm_convert_to_bv(val);
00236   uvm_config_db<sc_dt::sc_bv<4096> >::set(0, instname, field, val);
00237 }
